SELECT FILE_NO as no, ORIGINAL_NAME as originalName, SAVE_NAME as saveName FROM MGV_ONE_FILE where FILE_NO = #{value}

SELECT A.ONE_NO as no, A.ONE_TITLE as title, A.ONE_CONTENT as content, A.ONE_ANSWERED as answered, A.ONE_DELETED as deleted, A.ONE_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, A.ONE_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.USER_ID as "user.id", A.LOCATION_NO as "location.no", B.LOCATION_NAME as "location.name", A.THEATER_NO as "theater.no", C.THEATER_NAME as "theater.name", A.CATEGORY_NO as "category.no", D.CATEGORY_NAME as "category.name" FROM MGV_SUPPORT_ONE A left outer join MGV_LOCATION B on A.LOCATION_NO = B.LOCATION_NO left outer join MGV_THEATERS C on A.THEATER_NO = C.THEATER_NO inner join MGV_SUPPORT_CATEGORIES D on A.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.ONE_NO = #{value} and A.ONE_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE MGV_SUPPORT_ONE
ONE_TITLE = #{title},
ONE_CONTENT = #{content},
ONE_ANSWERED = #{answered},
ONE_DELETED = #{deleted},
ONE_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
ONE_CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
WHERE ONE_NO= #{no}
